nodes.text: The Intelligentsia were one of the two main divisions of Yinchorri society, the other being the warrior caste. They were the natural rulers of the Yinchorri, and had a great affinity for technology. They made up the membership of the Council of Elders. They were somewhat paranoid and belligerent.
Members of the intelligentsia included Sothek, Kardek, and Jorek.
